techmeme.title: Leaked all-hands: Mark Zuckerberg said Meta sold more than 1M Ray-Ban smart glasses in 2024, revealing sales figures for the first time (The Verge)
Tim Cook says there are now more than 2.35B active Apple devices worldwide, a new record, up from 2.2B devices the company reported in February 2024 (Juli Clover/MacRumors)
Apple reports Q1 revenue from Services, which includes App Store, Apple TV+, and Apple Music, up 14% YoY to $26.34B, an all-time high, vs. $26.09B est. (Stephen Nellis/Reuters)
Apple reports a record $124.3B revenue in Q1, up 4% YoY, net income up 7.1% to $36.3B, China net sales down 11% to $18.5B, largest drop in China since Q1 2024 (CNBC)
Apple Q1: iPhone down 1% YoY to $69.14B, vs. $71.03B est., Mac up 15% to $8.99B, iPad up 15% to $8.09B, and Wearables, Home, and Accessories down 2% to $11.75B (Apple Inc.)
